item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, March 5, 2025 at 1:25 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Richard Sutton and Andrew Barto Win 2024 Turing Award (177 points | 31 comments)

14. Brother accused of locking down third-party printer ink cartridges (369 points | 211 comments)

26. Solving SICP (149 points | 34 comments)

28. The Demoralization is just Beginning (342 points | 517 comments)
29. Show HN: Open-source Deep Research across workplace applications (106 points | 27 comments)
30. Who's Afraid of Tom Wolfe? (85 points | 20 comments)
